title: Hans Christian Andersen. Vol. 2
brief_description: These adaptations of some of Hans Christian Andersen’s stories have been produced as a teaching aid for Australian schools. The presentation has been designed to enhance children’s listening and concentration skills and to inspire their imaginations. Each story is beautifully illustrated with full colour drawings. Narrator Grant Denyer’s lively storytelling comes from his experience in education and television, giving the stories a crisp easy listening feel. Volume two contains “The ugly duckling”, “The red shoes”, “The little match girl”, “A brief history of Hans Christian Anderson”.
